Church Printing to Be Done by Skilled Adventists.-- There should be seen in the office at Mountain View a work of education. The workers should become proficient in 


                                                      121 

every part of the work of printing and book binding. They should be trained to do missionary work. But there are many who need first to learn lessons in the control of their spirit, and the careful selection of their words. If there is a hardness in your voice, if you are in the habit of speaking unkindly, you must have, before you can enter the kingdom of glory, an education in the grace and gentleness of Christ.
